basics.name: Wassim Ben Youssef
basics.label: Data Scientist, ML and AI Engineer
basics.summary: A Data science and AI engineering expert with over 7 years of practical experience working in different industries.

work.name: Artefact MENA
work.summary: Artefact MENA is a data consultancy company aiding corporations in their digital transformation initiatives. I worked on developing and implementing the roadmap for data strategy for an asset management company. I Led data analysis and machine learning projects for clients in the construction, real estate, and hospitality sectors.
highlights: Managed a team of 3 data analysts and data scientists.
Developed a clustering-based approach to estimate the cost of future construction projects.
Built machine learning models to forecast the occupancy rate of golf courses.
Built P&L reporting dashboards for Golf and Hospitality sectors.

work.name: Xelix
work.summary: Xelix is a SaaS company that helps identify errors and frauds in invoices using AI bolted onto the clients finance systems . I joined as the first Data Scientist and automated the invoice error and fraud detection process, saving millions of Â£ to our customers.
highlights: Developed ML models to identify errors and frauds in invoice fields.
Trained model to identify invoices associated with incorrect vendors.
Implement an AI system with a combination of rule-based algorithms and ML models to detect duplicated invoices.
Implemented scalable production code to process millions of invoices
Designed and implemented the monitoring and retraining lifecycle of models

work.name: Digital Fineprint
work.summary: Digital Fineprint is an award-winning insurtech company that assists the insurance community in engaging and understanding SME clients. I joined the company as the first data scientist to build a SaaS product that uses all available open source data to provide insightful information about SMEs to our insurance clients.
highlights: Developed ML models to identify errors and frauds in invoice fields.
Trained model to identify invoices associated with incorrect vendors.
Implement an AI system with a combination of rule-based algorithms and ML models to detect duplicated invoices.
Implemented scalable production code to process millions of invoices
Designed and implemented the monitoring and retraining lifecycle of models

teaching.summary:
Authoring an online course of 4 hours about Advanced Machine Learning for Business Professionals. Creating
all the content and the slides and recording the videos.
Worked as a teacher for a data science bootcamp provided by Le Wagon. Coached and helped students to learn all the technical skills for a successfull data science career.

skills.name: ML, AI and Data
